title: Harry Potter Born
description: The fictional birth of Harry Potter in the wizarding world.

title: Voldemort Attacks the Potters
description: Harry survives Voldemortâ€™s Killing Curse, leaving his iconic lightning scar.

title: Harry Starts Hogwarts
description: Harry Potter begins his magical education at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

title: Battle of Hogwarts
description: The final confrontation between Harry and Voldemort ends with Voldemort's defeat.

title: First Harry Potter Book Published
description: J.K. Rowling publishes 'Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone' in the UK.

title: Harry Potter Film Series Begins
description: The first movie, 'Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone,' is released.

title: Final Harry Potter Book Published
description: 'Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows' concludes the book series.

title: Final Harry Potter Film Released
description: 'Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2' marks the end of the film saga.

title: Fantastic Beasts Film Series Begins
description: The wizarding world expands with 'Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them'.

title: Wizarding World Theme Parks Open
description: Universal Studios opens the Wizarding World of Harry Potter in Orlando, Florida.
